Description.Name: MercNews Broadcast
Description.Details:
DUKE TANCRED, ARDAN SORTEK INVADE NEW AVALON!


New Avalon, Federated Commonwealth:  On June 30, Duke Tancred's Second Robinson Rangers, First Crucis Lancers and Davion Heavy Guards made landing on the continent of Brunswick, followed a week later by Field Marshal Ardan Sortek with the Second Ceti Hussars and the Davion Light Guards.  Defending Archon-Princess Katrina Steiner, the Loyalists were led by Marshal of the Armies Jackson Davion, and included the Nineteenth Arcturan Guards, Tenth Deneb Light Cavalry, Fifth Donegal Guard, Third Robinson Rangers, Seventeenth Avalon Hussars, the Remagen CMM and Comstar's 299th Division.

This now begins what is considered by trillions the largest and most important battle of the Federated Commonwealth Civil War.

Description.Name: MercNews Broadcast
Description.Details:
CHAOS MARCH UPDATE!


Small World, Federated Commonwealth: When the Loyalist Seventh Arcturan Guard landed on Small World, they believed this was a stop-over before continuing to New Avalon.  The Arcturan Guards were caught by complete surprise when the planetary militia, led by mercenary command Smithson's Chinese Bandits, attacked the Seventeenth while they were landing.  The Arcturans were quickly reinforced by the Loyalist Archenar SMM, and Smithson's Chinese Bandits are reported to be on the run.  Pro-Victor General Koenig has made an open call for mercenaries to joing the Fifth Syrtis Fusiliers as they reinforce the Chinese Bandits.  Noted mercenaries Wilson's Hussars, lured by favourable salvage rights and preferential treatment for future AFFS contracts, have already signed with Koenig and are en-route to the planet.
